items.sentence: I thought Tom had already talked to Mary about that.
I thought it would be best if you told Tom yourself.
I thought you were going to do something about that.
Tom didn\'t have the courage to tell Mary the truth.
Tom didn\'t have time to explain everything to Mary.
Tom didn\'t have to speak. Mary did all the talking.
Tom will help you as soon as he finishes doing that.
Tom will never be able to do that without some help.
Tom will never be able to do that without your help.
Tom will probably get hurt if he does that that way.
